title: Searching For The Best BBQ On Labor Day And Beyond
teaser: As Americans gather around the grill to say goodbye to summer, we revisit a conversation about the best barbecue in America.
contentencoded:
On Labor Day, people around the country are gathering around the grill to say goodbye to summer. To mark the occasion, we revisit a conversation Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson had with Daniel Vaughn in July 2013.

Vaughn is the barbecue editor at Texas Monthly, and his book, “The Prophets of Smoked Meat: A Journey Through Texas Barbecue,” boldly claims the Lonestar State is home to the best barbecue in the world. What about other states? Don’t worry. We ask him about that too.

Guest

  • Daniel Vaughn, Texas Monthly barbecue editor and author of “The Prophets of Smoked Meat: A Journey Through Texas Barbecue.” He tweets @BBQsnob.
